text: there wasn t one thing that made this buffet so horrible it s just the of everything being less than average quality there are plenty of options but of them were flavorful hot or worth up on some have on the dessert being but to us everything tasted and on the side the had probably the best but all were still bland the worst part is that when i was going to a from the pizza someone had the on top of the pizza so all the were in with the food there were two right there who didn t think this was i would have the my husband and i both left with and looked to the second dinner we would have a few hours later at a much better
